alert.note: Alert for Lawrence; Lincoln (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 08 at 5:01PM CST until February 08 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lincoln County in south central Mississippi... Northwestern Lawrence County in south central Mississippi... * Until 600 PM CST. * At 500 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Summit, or 7 miles north of Mccomb, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Brookhaven, Enterprise, Sontag, Bogue Chitto and East Lincoln. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CST for central and south central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
